name: eat-da-burger
description: * Eat-Da-Burger! is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat.  * Whenever a user submits a burger's name, it will be displayed on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured.  * Each burger in the waiting area also has a `Devour it!` button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page.  * This app will store every burger in a database, whether devoured or not.
